page.description: Create a list of the table columns (optionally including types).
page.original:
SQL::TableInfo::ListColumns() Syntax Column_List as C = SQL::TableInfo::ListColumns( [ Include_Types as L ] ) ArgumentDescription Column_ListA CR-LF delimited list of column names. Include_TypesOptional. Indicates whether to include Alpha Five data type, length, and decimal points.
Description The SQL::TableInfo::ListColumns() function lists the columns for the current table. If IncludeTypes is set to true, the list also includes the Alpha data type and the length and precision in comma separated format. Example
See Also SQL::TableInfo Object
